column4: 'm trying to compile Audacity, but when I run ./configure && make, I get: "configure: error: "Could not find wx-config: is wxWindows installed? is wx-config in your path?"'. I do have libwxgtk2.6-0 installed.
you need the -dev package of libwxgtk2.6-0
could he still use the server kernel with restricted modules then?
the last message i sent to kupesoft was what i meant to send to you
